page.robots



  • Meetings
  • About
  • Get Involved
  • Meetup Page
  • Repository

Adds a robots meta tag to the page. Read Google Webmasters for available directives.

Type

string or sequence

Example

Instruct web crawlers to not index the page and to not crawl any of the links on the page:

---
robots:
  - noindex
  - nofollow
---
